scenes.background: Bob taps his pen on the table and looks at Monica.
scenes.description: 'Sticking to one idea might oversimplify things. How will we ensure everyone feels included?'

options.text: We can rotate the activities so everyone gets a chance to enjoy their preferred type.
options.analysis: You suggested a balanced approach, showing good perception, empathy, and social skills, but self-regulation and motivation were moderate.

options.text: Maybe we should just make a decision and not worry too much about everyone's preferences.
options.analysis: You leaned towards decisiveness, showing good self-regulation and motivation, but empathy and perception were lower.

options.text: We could send out a poll to see what the majority prefers.
options.analysis: You suggested a democratic approach, showing good social skills, but perception, empathy, and self-regulation were moderate.
